entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
